GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.18.6
GSD.description:
irqchip/gic-v3: Fix error handling in gic_populate_ppi_partitions

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit c83c34c57798fc41faefcf078be78683db2f4beb, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 52085d3f2028d853f8d6ce7ead2f8a504f6077fa. For more details please see the references link.
